title: 正版购买完，几天后不能用
author: 淡漠==
txt_content:
User not found. If you are using a Mojang account, go to https://account.mojang.com/ instead
Oops, unknown username or password. If you are logging in with a Mojang account make sure to use your e-mail address as username.

replies.author: kissinger
replies.txt_content: 密码或邮箱错了，如果lz是代购的话，那么恭喜你，有可能你已被骗，推荐lz找鬼鬼代购

replies.author: Minecraftian
replies.txt_content: 账号密码对了么？在哪儿买的？

replies.author: 崞君
replies.txt_content: 你买的多少钱 ，，， 官方是183如果买低价的就是黑卡 没多长时间就会回收的 你看看MOJANG给你寄邮件没
